settings.heading: Answer the following questions
settings.style:
<class>completion_popup</class>
/* -- Desktop Style --*/

/* -- Custom Selectors --*/
#this-block .question-heading{
font-size:16px;
margin-bottom:20px;
font-weight:600;
}
#this-block .questions-wrapper{
margin-bottom:20px;
}
#this-block .questions-wrapper label{
font-size:15px;
font-weight:600;
margin-bottom:10px;
}
#this-block .questions-wrapper textarea{
border:1px solid #ededed;
border-radius:10px;
padding:10px 20px 10px 20px;
color:#000;
}
#this-block .questions-wrapper textarea:hover{
border:1px solid #ededed;
}
#this-block .questions-wrapper textarea.disabled{
background:#ededed;
cursor:not-allowed;
}
#this-block .question-buttons button{
border:0;
padding:7px 20px 7px 20px;
border-radius:5px;
background:var(--accent-color-1);
color:#fff;
display:block;
margin:0 auto;
font-weight:600;
padding:15px 30px 15px 30px;
width:100%;
}
#this-block  .question-buttons .edit_answers{
margin: 0 0 15px;
    background: none;
    padding: 0;
    color: var(--accent-color-1);
font-size: 12px;
font-weight: 500;
}
#this-block .nblock.nblock-questions{
margin:40px 0px 0px 0px;
text-align:left;
padding: 10px 0;
    border-top: 1px solid rgb(0 0 0 / 5%);
}
#this-block button.submit_answers.disabled{
background:#ededed;
color:var(--text-color-1);
cursor:not-allowed;
}

<class>p1_btn</class>
/* -- Desktop Style --*/
margin:10px 0px 0px 0px;
/* -- Custom Selectors --*/
[Button Style]
#this-block a{
    width: 100%;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
border: none;
min-height: 51px;
    padding: 10px 20px;
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 15px;
color: var(--text-color-1);
}
#this-block a span{
color: var(--text-color-1) !important;
}
.dark #this-block{
border-color: var(--text-color-1)
}
[Icon]
#this-block a:before{
content: '\f00c';
font-family: "Font Awesome 5 Pro";
margin-right: 10px;
font-weight: 900;
color: #32d732;
}
[Button - Hover]
#this-block a:hover{
filter: brightness(1.4);
}

settings.style:
<class>heading</class>
/* -- Desktop Style --*/
font-size:80px;
margin-bottom:10px;
color: #000;


/* -- Mobile Style --*/
font-size:40px;

/*-- Custom Selectors --*/
#this-block em{
position:relative;
display:inline-block;
font-style:unset;
}
#this-block em:before{
content:"";
z-index:-1;
left:-0.2em;
top:0em;
border-width:5px;
border-style:solid;
border-color:var(--accent-color-1);
position:absolute;
border-right-color:transparent;
width:110%;
height:1em;
transform:rotate(2deg);
opacity:0.7;
border-radius:50%;
padding:0.1em 0.25em 0.1em 0.25em;
}
#this-block em:after{
content:"";
z-index:-1;
left:-0.1em;
top:0.1em;
padding:0.1em 0.25em 0.1em 0.25em;
border-width:5px;
border-style:solid;
border-color:var(--accent-color-1);
border-left-color:transparent;
border-top-color:transparent;
position:absolute;
width:110%;
height:1em;
transform:rotate(-1deg);
opacity:0.7;
border-radius:50%;
}
